info.title: Social Network Bekend API documentation
info.description: The service is hosted on a free server, so it takes some time for it to wake up. Please be patient.

409.description: User with this email is already registered

post.summary: Send password reset link by email

200.description: Reset link have been successfully sent to your email
User information has been successfully changed

get.summary: Add user to skill by id

409.description: User was added to this skill before

get.summary: Remove user from skill by id

201.description: Successfully create a new media file

200.description: Successfully fetch all popular posts (sorted by likes)

delete.summary: Delete an own media file by id

404.description: Like ID is invalid or not found

409.description: Рost was added to favorites before

404.description: Post ID is invalid or not found

200.description: Post was removed from your favorites

404.description: Post ID is invalid or not found

201.description: The worker was successfully added to the company

200.description: Successfully fetch all your company's jobs

Successfully fetch all applied jobs (sorted by applied users)
